rules_text:
If you control four or fewer lands, destroy target creature or planeswalker.
Cycling–Sacrifice a land. [i](Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“. . . but they craved more. Each hid its heart beneath no moon, and crept to the edge of no sun, and there, in gloom, waited with grasping hand.”
—[/i]Fables of the Fassahd[i][/i]
